name: Don't pay with your life
description:
Don't pay with your life is a little plattformer created for the Ludum Dare game jam.

In search of wealth you have to make your way through the dungeon. Collect coins, fight opponents or try to get past them.
On your way you can collect new equipment and discover secret hidden places.

Controls are
A+D oder Cursors for left+right
Space for jump
Ctrl for attack
